definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: He was born in the village of Braintree, Massachusetts, in seventeen thirty-five.
sentences.chinese: 他在1735年出生在马萨诸塞州的智树村。

sentences.english: In Massachusetts, homeless shelters are at capacity.
sentences.chinese: 马萨诸塞州的收容所已经爆满。

sentences.english: One kind of regulation stops me from swimming in a pond in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 一种管制阻止我在马萨诸塞州的小池子里游泳。

sentences.english: He worked as an evolutionary biologist at Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 他是马萨诸塞州剑桥镇的哈佛大学的进化生物学家。

sentences.english: How many pianoare there in Massachusetts?
sentences.chinese: 马萨诸塞州有多少钢琴调音师？

sentences.english: How many piano tuners are there in Massachusetts?
sentences.chinese: 马萨诸塞州有多少钢琴调音师？

sentences.english: Cased Pocket Revolver, . 28 Caliber, Massachusetts Arms Co. , Massachusetts Arms Co. , Chicopee Falls, MA.
sentences.chinese: 袖珍左轮手枪，28口径，马萨诸塞州武器公司。

sentences.english: Two of the nation's 20 hardest-hit congressional districts are located in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 全美20个遭受重创的选区中，马萨诸塞州占了两个。
马萨诸塞州的举措尤具创意。

sentences.english: My mother grew up in Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲在马萨诸塞州长大。

sentences.english: Consider a series of reports by the Massachusetts state auditor.
sentences.chinese: 想想马萨诸塞州审计员的一系列的报告。

sentences.english: Kennedy had been competing in a regatta off Martha's Vineyard, one of a cluster of Massachusetts islands.
sentences.chinese: 爱德华在马萨诸塞州马莎葡萄园岛参加赛舟会。

sentences.english: In Massachusetts at a wake, mourners may eat no more than three sandwiches.
sentences.chinese: 在马萨诸塞州，守丧时代，悼念者只能吃三个三明治。

sentences.english: Massachusetts offers the first scratch-off lottery ticket in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 1974年，马萨诸塞州发行美国第一种即开型彩票。

sentences.english: The Alcotts later settled in Concord, Massachusetts.
sentences.chinese: Alcotts后来定居在美国马萨诸塞州康科德，。

pinyin: Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1
